_arcade_rom_naming_stock: WARNING: CHANGING THIS SETTING WILL FORCE REBOOT!
Stock arcade ROM naming uses a hard-coded list of file names to determine display names in the UI.
The stock name list is incomplete, inaccurate and not editable.
RECOMMENDATION: Switch to custom naming library.
_arcade_rom_naming_custom: WARNING: CHANGING THIS SETTING WILL FORCE REBOOT!
WARNING: REVERTING TO STOCK WILL REMOVE ANY CUSTOM NAMES ADDED TO '{arcade_names_file}'
Custom arcade ROM naming uses a configurable list of ROM file names to determine display names in the UI.
